official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide benefits to essential spouses of disability beneficiaries without regard to age or children in care.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to provide benefits for essential spouses of disability beneficiaries without regard to age.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide benefits to essential spouses of disability beneficiaries without regard to age or children in care.
